author: Maggie Fitzgerald
title: Charles Schwab says broker's move to zero commissions was an ultimate goal for the firm
description: Charles Schwab spoke to CNBC's Bob Pisani on "The Halftime Report" on Monday.
content:
This is a breaking news story. Please check back for updates.
Charles Schwab said the discount broker's latest move to zero commissions was a long-time goal to deliver to investors. 
"It was sort of the final solution for investors," chairman and founder of… [+1107 chars]
